word.name: Word
word.doc: Represents an individual word used in a text document. Case-sensitive.

combo.name: StatedWord
combo.doc: Represents a word used in a specific statement

word.name: Delimiter
word.doc: Represents a character sequence used to separate two statements or parts of a statement

props.name: text
props.doc: The characters that form this delimiter

word.name: Statement
word.doc: Represents an individual statement made within some text. Consecutive statements form whole texts.

props.doc: Id of the delimiter that terminates this sentence. None if this sentence is not terminated with any character.
Time when this statement was first made

word.name: WordPlacement
word.doc: Records when a word is used in a statement

props.doc: Id of the statement where the referenced word appears
Id of the word that appears in the described statement

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: Index at which the specified word appears within the referenced statement (0-based)

url.name: Domain
url.doc: Represents the address of an internet service

props.name: url
props.doc: Full http(s) address of this domain in string format. Includes protocol, domain name and possible port number.

url.name: RequestPath
url.doc: Represents a specific http(s) request url, not including any query parameters

combo.name: DetailedRequestPath
combo.doc: Includes textual domain information in a request path

props.doc: Id of the domain part of this url

props.name: path
props.doc: Part of this url that comes after the domain part. Doesn't include any query parameters, nor the initial forward slash.

url.name: Link
url.doc: Represents a link for a specific http(s) request

props.doc: Id of the targeted internet address, including the specific sub-path

props.name: queryParameters
props.doc: Specified request parameters in model format

url.name: LinkPlacement
url.doc: Places a link within a statement

props.doc: Id of the statement where the specified link is referenced

props.name: orderIndex
props.doc: Index where the link appears in the statement (0-based)
